verses.text: How long, \nd Lord\nd*, will you forget me forever? How long will you hide \w your|strong="H1732"\w* face from me?

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* must \w I|strong="H5704"\w* nurse grief \w inside|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w a|strong="H3068"\w* daily sorrow? \w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes \w to|strong="H5704"\w* exult \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Look|strong="H7896"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, answer \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \nd Lord\nd* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God. Fill \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyes \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* light, lest \w I|strong="H5704"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*,

\w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies claim \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* triumphed, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes rejoice \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* downfall.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* kindness: \w my|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w will|strong="H6862"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* help.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
